titleStmt.title: Von Ludwig Wittgenstein an Walter Morley Fletcher, 10. 1. 1913
titleStmt.author: Wittgenstein, Ludwig

sourceDesc.p: Original an der Trinity College Library; Kopie im BA.

list.item: 2007/06: Conversion from Folio Flat File to XML

div.p: I am afraid I shall not be able to come to Cambridge at the begining of term as my father is very seriously ill. Although it is certain that he will not recover, one can not yet tell whether the illness will take a very rapid course or not. I will therefore have to stay here another ten days & hope I shall then be able to decide whether I may go back to Cambridge or must stay in Vienna, until the end. If I cannot leave here in ten days I will let you know.
